channel.title: After Install Game screws my resolution
channel.description:
So after i downloaded/installed Black Mesa files using the installer AND downloading SDK base 2007&2006 i checked the 'launch black mesa something something' option. my screen goes black, my monitor says resolution not supported.
i re-booted my PC, but on normal mode and safe mode they both get resolution not supported Even though i didn't launch the game. my resolution got altered. So after 2 more futile reboots (just for the fun of it :'( ) i was able to get to my home screen on my PC. In my steam library i see Black Mesa is in there.
I am wondering if anyone else got an issue like this: perhaps i should have just launched the game from steam? ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My new problem after the previous event is that when i launch the game through steam the game instant crashes after 3 seconds in main menu screen (Before the blurry screen effect goes away).
